class.name: IKKusudama3D
class.brief_description: Kusudamas are sequential collections of reach cones that form a path through their tangents.
class.description: A Kusudama represents a ball with multiple reach-cones protruding from it. These reach cones are arranged in sequence, creating an automatic smooth path from one cone to another. The term 'Kusudama' originates from Japanese, referring to a ball with multiple cones protruding from it.

method.name: get_open_cones
method.description: This method returns an array of limit cones associated with the Kusudama.

method.name: set_open_cones
method.description: This method sets the limit cones associated with the Kusudama.
